€500 voucher to discover the Shannon up for grabs!
 

This summer you might be planning a staycation, renovation or simply catching up with friends or family. The last thing you probably want to do is spend your time searching for pet insurance.

So to help you spend more time with your pet and do the things you really want to do, we are offering our best price online! That’s right, we are giving 10% off* pet insurance when you buy online! So why not get a quote!

And that’s not all… if you buy a policy from Allianz, you can save 20% off any car policy or 10% off any other policy you buy from Allianz Direct in the future!
GET QUOTE
 

How would you like to spend a few days on a boat exploring the River Shannon? Check out our competition below and maybe you could be the lucky person who can enjoy a nice staycation! We also have an interesting blog on helping your pet adjust as you stop working from home.

PS. Keep an eye out for next month’s Allianz Pet Insurance ezine where we will have a very special pet-tastic competition for you to enter!

*As long as the policy remains in force and subject to policy terms.
 
 
WE COVER COURAGE

As our country begins to move again with businesses reopening, people holidaying in Ireland and friends & family reuniting, now more than ever courage is helping us play the game of our lives. At Allianz we want to do everything we can to help our customers to live their lives fully.

The continuous struggle between “Courage & Fear” is the main story of our new brand advert which was recently launched. This advert builds on our previous “Courage v Fear” advert which featured Tipperary Hurling Captain Séamus Callanan.
 
 
COMPETITION
